Class TextIndividualsFactory<T extends TextItem>

  • java.lang.Object
    • es.uc3m.baldo.opinais.ir.TextIndividualsFactory<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - the type of the items to be converted to individuals.

    IndividualsFactory<T>

    public class TextIndividualsFactory<T extends TextItem>
extends java.lang.Object
implements IndividualsFactory<T>
    TextInvidualsFactory.

    Generates a set of text individuals from a source file.

    Author:
    Alejandro Baldominos

    • Method Detail

      • makeIndividuals

        public java.util.Set<Individual> makeIndividuals(java.io.File inputFile,
                                        Reader<T> reader,
                                        java.util.List<PreProcessor<java.lang.String>> preprocessors,
                                        int nFeatures,
                                        int nIndividuals,
                                        boolean isBalanced)

        Generates a set of individuals from a source file.

        Specified by:
        makeIndividuals in interface IndividualsFactory<T extends TextItem>
        Parameters:
        inputFile - the source file containing the items.
        reader - a reader object which provides the logic to retrieve items from the input file.
        preprocessors - a list of pre-processors to be executed over the items.
        nFeatures - the number of features to be extracted.
        nIndividuals - the number of individuals to be generated, where 0 means that all individuals are actually chosen.
        isBalanced - whether the number of individuals for each type must be balanced.
        Returns:
        the set of generated individuals.
